subject: FROM THE DESK OF UNITE BANK OF AFRICA  UBA /  Attn: Jeanne,
body:
Attn: Jeanne,



Your  mail  has  officially  confirmed  in regards   to the  transfer  , but  we  has  to let  you  know  that  we  has  waited  for your  response  for a  very  long  time  up  till  now and the  transaction  is  about  to be  cancelled  and you  are  very  lucky  we  has  received   your message   and we  has  been  making  arrangement   to complete  the  transfer  of the  fund   into your  account  and we  has  finally  done.



Right   now all your are require  to  PAY US$250.00 DOLLARS REPRESENTING STATUTORY TRANSFER CLEARING/DOCUMENTATION VALIDATION CHARGES / to  enable  the  transfer  of  the 800,000,00USD to  be  credited  into your  account  and  you  are  require  to  give  us  our  own  GIVE US 10% OF THE TOTAL SUM  800,000,00USD AS SOON AS YOUR ACCOUNT IS CREDITED.



We  advise   you  to  forward  all  information  details  of your  receiving  bank  account  , your  full  name  and  address , including  the  scanned  copy   of  your   international  passport  of  ID  card  with  the  payment   confirmation   of  the US$250.00    once  all  this   requirement   receive in less  than 24hours   the  fund 800,000,00USD will  be  finally  transferred  into your  account.



You  are  kindly  advice  to proceed  ahead  in  regards  to the  payment  once  you  receive  this  mail  and make  sure  all  that  this  transaction  remain  secret  till  you  finally  received  the  transfer   into your  bank  account  with  the  signal  alert   once  the  transfer  is  completed  into your  account.



Kindly  proceed  ahead  to make  sure  that  you  send  the  fee  via  western  union  or  money  gram to  our  accountant  officer  legal  department  name below .



RECEIVER, S NAME: RACHEAL MENASE
CITY: OUAGADOUGOU
COUNTRY: BURKINA  FASO
AMOUNT SEND:$250.00USD
SENDER'S NAME:::::::::::::::::::::
SENDER'S COUNTRY NAME::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::;
REFERENCE  NUMBER:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::



 Once  you  made  the  payment  to the  receiver  name  above  via  western  union  or money  gram  kindly  forward  to us  the copy  of the  transfer  payment  slip  of the $250.00USD to finalize   the  transfer  of the 800,000,00USD into your  receiving  bank  account  which  you  are  going  to provided  to receive  the  fund



Waiting for your response



Thanks

Dr Grace Favour

CHIEF ENGINEER IN THE COMPUTER/TELEX DEPARTMENT

**********************************************************************************************




FROM THE DESK OF UNITE BANK OF AFRICA MANAGEMENT
BURKINA FASO OUAGADOUGOU
DIRECTOR FOREIGN REMIT DEPT
UBA BANK PLC AFRICA


ATTENTION: DEAR BENEFICIARY,

THIS IS TO ACKNOWLEDGE THE RECEIPT OF YOUR MAIL,I AM ONLY TAKING ADVANTAGE OF THE DISMISSED TOP OFFICIALS SOME OF THEM ARE ON COMPULSORY VACATION THIS HAS ACCORD ME GOLDEN OPPORTUNITY TO SERVE YOU AND YOU WILL BE PROUD IF YOU COMPLY WITH ME.

SELF, ONE OF MY COLLEAGUE AND THE DIRECTOR OF INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT HAVE AGREED TO ASSIST YOU BASED ON THE FOLLOWING CONDITION THAT YOU MUST KEEP THIS AGREEMENT VERY SECRET NO ONE HERE IN AFRICA MUST KNOW ABOUT THIS DEAL AND MUST BE PREPARED TO GIVE US 10% OF THE TOTAL SUM  800,000,00USD AS SOON AS YOUR ACCOUNT IS CREDITED.

WE HAVE COMPLETED OUR FINAL VERIFICATION ON YOUR FILE AND CONFIRMED THE SAME FOR SWIFT TRANSFER TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT. NOTE THAT PAYMENT CONFIRMATION BY SWIFT IS WITHIN 72HRS CONFIRMATION AND YOU ARE REQUIRED TO PAY US$250.00 DOLLARS REPRESENTING STATUTORY TRANSFER CLEARING/DOCUMENTATION VALIDATION CHARGES.

PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS CHARGE IS NOT DEDUCTIBLE FROM THE PRINCIPAL
AMOUNT AND IT YOUR OWN RESPONSIBILITY TO PAY IT OFF FOR ACTUALIZATION OF THE TRANSACTION,

THE ACCOUNTANT LEGAL DEPARTMENT OFFICER NAME IS BELLOW  VIA  WESTERN  UNION  MONEY  TRANSFER   OR  MONEY  GRAM:

RECEIVER, S NAME: RACHEAL MENASE
CITY: OUAGADOUGOU
COUNTRY: BURKINA  FASO
AMOUNT SEND:$250.00USD
SENDER'S NAME:::::::::::::::::::::
SENDER'S COUNTRY NAME::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::;
REFERENCE  NUMBER:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::



DR. GRACE FAVOUR
IN CASE IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTION PLEASE REVERT BACK TO US. CHIEF
ENGINEER IN THE COMPUTER/TELEX DEPARTMENT

subject: Re: FROM THE DESK OF UNITE BANK OF AFRICA  UBA /  Attn: Jeanne,
body:
Dear Dr. Grace Favour,

Thank you for your email and the detailed information provided. I understand the urgency of this matter and the need for confidentiality.

However, before proceeding with the payment, I would like to clarify a few things:

1. Could you please provide more details about the "US DOLLARS STATUTORY TRANSFER CLEARING VALIDATION CHARGES"? How is this fee calculated and why is it necessary?

2. You mentioned that I should send the payment via Western Union or MoneyGram. Could you please provide me with more specific instructions on how to do this? 

3. Lastly, could you please confirm that once this fee is paid, there will be no further charges or fees required from my end?

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Jeanne

subject: Re: FROM THE DESK OF UNITE BANK OF AFRICA  UBA /  Attn: Jeanne,
body:
Dear Dr. Grace Favour,

Thank you for your email and the detailed information provided. I understand that there are some charges to be paid for the transfer of funds. However, before proceeding with any payments, I would like to clarify a few things.

Firstly, could you please provide me with more details about these charges? What exactly is the "US DOLLARS STATUTORY TRANSFER CLEARING VALIDATION CHARGES"? 

Secondly, I would appreciate if you could explain why this charge cannot be deducted from the principal amount? It seems more logical and straightforward to deduct any necessary fees from the total sum before transferring it.

Lastly, I am concerned about the confidentiality of this transaction as mentioned in your email. Could you please assure me that all my personal and financial information will be kept secure throughout this process?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jeanne

subject: Re: FROM THE DESK OF UNITE BANK OF AFRICA  UBA /  Attn: Jeanne,
body:
Attn: Jeanne,


According  to my  response  to your  mail  I have  to let  you  know  and  understand  that  is  not  possible  to make  any  deduction  from  the  account  for  payment  of any  fee  ,  because  you  are  not  the  initial  depositor of  the  fund  and  moreover  the  fund  is  covered  by a  comprehensive  insurance  bond  policy  which  makes  it  impossible  to make  any  deduction  from  the    principal  sum  of the  fund   for  any  payment .

For  that  reason  you  shall  be  responsible   to take  care   of the  payment  US$250.00 DOLLARS   it  cannot  be  deducted  from  the  fund  according  to our  banking  rules  and regulation .

Listen  I  prefer  let  not  make  any  argument   on this  matter  go  ahead  and send  the  fee  so that  the  transfer  will  proceed  into your  receiving   bank account  which  you  are  going  to provided  to receive  the  fund  and there  shall  never  be  any  other  payment  once  these  fee  is  paid .

Waiting for your response,
Thanks,

Dr Grace Favour,

CHIEF ENGINEER IN THE COMPUTER/TELEX DEPARTMENT .

subject: Re: FROM THE DESK OF UNITE BANK OF AFRICA  UBA /  Attn: Jeanne,
body:
Dear Dr. Grace Favour,

Thank you for your response and clarification on the matter. I understand that the fee cannot be deducted from the fund due to banking rules and regulations.

However, I would like to know more about the process of transferring this fund into my account. Could you please provide me with detailed information on how this will be done? 

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Jeanne

subject: Re: FROM THE DESK OF UNITE BANK OF AFRICA  UBA /  Attn: Jeanne,
body:
Attn: Jeanne,


Kindly  update  in regards  to the  payment  of the US$250.00 DOLLARS STATUTORY TRANSFER CLEARING VALIDATION CHARGES"?  because  is  very  much  important  so  that  we  can  proceed  to the  transfer ,   your  response  is  highly  needed  to enable  us  to proceed  to the  transfer
Thanks

Dr Grace Favour,

CHIEF ENGINEER IN THE COMPUTER/TELEX DEPARTMENT .

subject: Re: FROM THE DESK OF UNITE BANK OF AFRICA  UBA /  Attn: Jeanne,
body:
Attn: Jeanne,

I  received  your  update  and  I want   you  to know  there  is  no  much  process  in that  once  the confirmation   of the  US$250.00 DOLLARS STATUTORY TRANSFER CLEARING VALIDATION CHARGES  along   your  receiving  bank  account  the  transfer  will  be  done  direct  into your  bank  account  through  bank  to bank  transfer  and  the  copy  of the  transfer  payment  slip  will  be  sent  to you  for the  confirmation  of the  transfer  into your  receiving  bank  account
Thanks

Dr Grace Favour,

CHIEF ENGINEER IN THE COMPUTER/TELEX DEPARTMENT.
